column1: #dig start(3; 3; Center tile of a 5-tile square) This is a 3x3
column2: 4 z-level (1 full counter-clockwise spiral) ramp staircase with two up ramps per level. I also added a dug out area around the staircase
column3: so it's actually 5x5. NOTE: Always begin a z-level down from where you want to start. (Ramps are upwards. Thus
column4: you need to start these designations from a z-level below.)
